name: Mad Monkey Free - Fun Kids Games and Kid Arcade...
name_original: Mad Monkey Free - Fun Kids Games and Kid Arcade...
description:
Mad Monkey Free!

This is the free version of the popular Mad Monkey game.

Mad Monkey, Mad Mad Monkey!!

Don't let that cute smile fool you! Mad Monkey steals all of your precious items, and then tosses them down at you trying to ruin your day! Chase him in the forest, the circus, a science lab (after an experiment gone wrong) and then face him as a ninja monkey! Catch everything he throws down at you in each level, and watch him get mad. He then throws faster and moves faster trying to splat everything!

You can now poke the monkey and annoy him some when he makes you mad!

Fun, addictive, arcade style gameplay.
Easy to pick up and play.
Precise touch control.
Great music and sound effects.
Retina Display support (Icon and Game Graphics)
Universal App

Intro Mad Monkey voice over by David Bottoms.
